there are times in which we all don't
give those off meta builds you know the
ones that seem pretty troll or
suboptimal at first glance all of the
recognition that they deserve even if it

turn out to be pretty darn powerful just
because people might be a little bit
scared to shape the meta and try
something new doesn't always mean it's
not very strong from the perspective of
someone who's been playing league for a
long time Malphite is by all means a
traditional tank he has everything that
a tank wants hard CC a slow an attack
speed slow form or utility he gains
bonus armor so he can specialize against
heavy ad teams and he even has abilities
that scale with his tank stats being
that he gets even stronger abilities by
building armor this must of course mean
that he should be a very niche counter
pick two teams who stack ad extremely
similar to ramus and he's going to be
unstoppable late-game after he reaches
over 400 armor right well this is true
right now Malphite is one of the best
tanks in the game he does do this job as
well as he's ever done against full ad
teams he does become an armored stacking
Goliath and he is fully capable of
playing full tank with grasp of the
undying or an arcane comet rune page in
the top lane but I'm not satisfied with
calling Malphite a tank just yet because
I'm more interested in assassin Malphite

Malphite received some changes that were
intended to update his gameplay and I
agree with this idea riot even states
themselves that Malphite is one of
league's oldest champions and in
desperate need of some kind of gameplay
refinement and modernization there are
plenty of old champions in League of
Legends that could use some love and
even though it's pretty subjective to
your own feeling while playing I think
Malphite was a fairly obvious example of
a champion that just felt really bad to
play he was clunky awkward outdated and
in a very nice spot in the meta
anyway which is not a good combination
of skills to have on a champion they
even talked about his various builds and
options in the patch notes of a previous
patch on 8.7 they talked about how some
built tanky some build him ap and some
even build Trinity Force which actually
is true this little update gave some new
life to our good old rock friend giving
him a new W now with advanced slap
technology he also has some nice new
visual effects especially his passive
shield looking much more visually
appropriate for a game in 2019 so if you
combo that his new W works as a proper
auto attacker reset finally a new visual
effects set some general quality-of-life
updates around the rest of his kit such
as better cast animations for Q the fact
that he grows in size with armor now
come on man that looks sick look at this
guy grow he actually begins to feel like
a real champion not necessarily a new
release or anything like that or even a
full-fledged rework but definitely as if
he can coexist in the universe with the
likes of these super high quality
releases such as gin

elos is seeing a great amount of play as

going full ap your best bet in the

really hit him where it hurts
one thing that's been abused by another
one of league's oldest champions this
season which happens to be Karthus is
the ultimate refund page domination and
precision using ultimate hunter and
presence of mind
this page is earth mode while it's true
that ravenous hunter is still taken by

obviously you can't go wrong with
ultimate hunter either this type of page
is all about getting as many kills and
assists as possible for more alts and
more alts equals getting more kills and
assists it's like a snowball effect
inside of your own rune page because the
more times you alt the more likely you
are to get kills the more likely you are
to get kills the more often your alt
will come back up because of presence of
mine let's do a little bit of math Mel
fights are at level 16 has a base
cooldown of 80 seconds with 40% CDR that
scales down to 48 seconds 25% off of
that number because you're taking
ultimate hunter and your R comes down to
36 seconds now 36 seconds on your R is
already disgustingly low but when you
combine that with presence of mind you
get 3.6 seconds off of each kill or
assist so at level 16 with 40% CDR if
you dive in with your R and kill their
backline and get a double kill which is
very realistic to assume because you're
playing ap Malphite at level 16 your R
will be up in less than 30 seconds earth
Malphite in ranked
one thing a note is that hitting 40% CDR
in the jungle role is a little bit
harder than an Elaine because the jungle
runic echoes only gives 10% CDR where
Luden's gives you the full 20% so you
might be asking why ever played Malphite
in the jungle then well a little hidden
part of the patch notes that many people
may have glossed over is that when the
original Malphite changes dropped the
live servers is w was not working
perfectly with hunter's talisman now
that bug has been cleared up and boy his
jungle clear is rock solid your clear is
healthy and fast and very competitive
with meta junglers but in the top lane
it is possible that you could play
against some bad matchups one matchup
that I thought would be absolutely
terrible would be something like the
cannon matchup but just recently I saw
row hammers take arcane comet and build
full ap and survive the lane and do well
in the rest of the game the best way
that you can survive and even win your
lane as ap Malphite is by stacking
dorans rings I think you should buy at
least two Dorrans rings every game and
situationally go for three they don't
have the best resale value nowhere close
to where they used to be but the best
part is you can easily spam your q4
harass and get people low enough to
finish them off at level 6 for jungling
take dark harvest if you're a Giga Smurf
madman Chadd and stack up to one-shot
people or if your high-low or Korean
take predator if you're somewhere in the
middle between outsider and mainstream
or maybe you're just na go for
electrocute the beauty of Malphite lies
in the simplicity because AP Malphite
doesn't violate the number one rule of
league of legends why play something
hard when you can play something simple
think about it like this
Malphite are at level six has 200 base
damage and a 100% ap ratio at the press
of a button you fly in at a speed that
unless you're twenty-five ping is very
hard to dodge or flash do extremely high
damage knock them up and easily execute
the rest of your point-and-click combo a
relatively easy skill shot to land
always allowing you to follow up with
more point-and-click damage sure you
could be a lucien Smurf a Zed Smurf and
a collie master you could show everyone
that you're faker you could practice day
in and day out your first 10 Akali games
you feed out of your mind you barely
know what you're doing you have a 30%
when right in ranked and you just can't
get the hang of it after hours of
grinding practice technical skill and
mastery you slowly begin to emerge from
the trenches of hell that is a learning
curve you rise up against the rest of
North America you soared beyond the
hopes and dreams of what you ever
thought were to be possible mechanical
prowess unrivaled reaction speed skill
shots with homing missile accuracy or
any way that's gonna be it if you ever
need that free low if you ever need a
friend to help you when you're down to
help you win those promos to help you
finally after thousands of games of
trying and you need to get out of bronze
there will always be a rock waiting
around the corner
Malphite is League of Legends secret
eloah machine designed to help you 1v9
